statements: SELECT * FROM return_authorizations;
SELECT return_auth_date, return_auth_reason FROM return_authorizations;
SELECT return_auth_id, return_items FROM return_authorizations ORDER BY return_auth_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM return_authorizations WHERE return_auth_reason='damaged';
SELECT return_auth_id, return_auth_reason FROM return_authorizations ORDER BY return_auth_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM return_authorizations WHERE return_auth_id = 1;
SELECT return_auth_id, return_auth_date, return_auth_reason FROM return_authorizations WHERE return_auth_id > 3 ORDER BY return_auth_date DESC;
SELECT return_auth_id, return_auth_date, return_items->>'product' AS product_name FROM return_authorizations WHERE return_items->>'quantity' > 5;
SELECT return_auth_id, return_auth_reason FROM return_authorizations WHERE return_auth_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(return_auth_id), EXTRACT(MONTH FROM return_auth_date) AS month FROM return_authorizations GROUP BY month ORDER BY COUNT(return_auth_id) DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM return_authorizations;
SELECT customer_id, return_reason FROM return_authorizations WHERE return_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT return_id, customer_id, return_reason FROM return_authorizations WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM return_authorizations;
SELECT * FROM return_management WHERE return_status = 'processing';
SELECT return_id, customer_id, return_reason, return_date FROM return_authorizations WHERE return_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT customer_id, return_reason, return_date FROM return_authorizations WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM return_management WHERE return_status = 'approved' ORDER BY return_id DESC
SELECT return_management.return_id, return_reason, return_date, return_status FROM return_authorizations JOIN return_management ON return_authorizations.return_id = return_management.return_id
SELECT customer_id, return_reason, return_date FROM return_authorizations WHERE return_reason IS NOT NULL ORDER BY return_date ASC
SELECT * FROM return_authorizations;
SELECT return_id, reason FROM return_authorizations WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM return_items WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT return_date, status FROM return_authorizations JOIN return_status ON return_authorizations.return_id = return_status.return_id;
SELECT MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity FROM return_items;
SELECT * FROM return_authorizations WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM return_items WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM return_items JOIN return_authorizations ON return_items.return_id = return_authorizations.return_id WHERE return_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT status FROM return_status WHERE status = 'Approved' OR status = 'Pending';
SELECT return_id, status FROM return_status WHERE status = 'Rejected' ORDER BY return_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM return_authorizations;
SELECT return_reason, return_date FROM return_authorizations ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_quantity FROM return_items WHERE item_quantity > 10;
SELECT return_id, processing_status FROM return_processing WHERE processing_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT history_description FROM return_history WHERE history_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM return_authorizations;
SELECT return_id, return_date, return_reason FROM return_authorizations ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_quantity FROM return_items WHERE item_quantity > 10;
SELECT history_id, return_id, history_date FROM return_history WHERE return_id = 1;
SELECT process_id, return_id, processing_date, processing_status FROM return_processing ORDER BY processing_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM return_authorizations WHERE return_date >= '2022-01-01' AND return_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM return_authorizations ORDER BY authorization_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT DISTINCT return_reason FROM return_items WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT customer_name, action_date, action_description FROM customers JOIN return_actions ON customers.customer_id = return_actions.authorization_id;
